summary: Initializes and aggregates test card classes for the Metaflow simplecard plugin, importing base card definitions and exposing a set of test cards—including a non‑editable import card—to validate UI rendering in the test suite.
business_intent: Provide a ready-to-use collection of test cards that enable automated verification of the simplecard plugin's user‑interface behavior and rendering correctness within Metaflow's testing framework.
